examples.description: is a class method that scrapes the student index page ('./fixtures/student-site/index.html') and a returns an array of hashes in which each hash represents one student
examples.full_description: Scraper #scrape_index_page is a class method that scrapes the student index page ('./fixtures/student-site/index.html') and a returns an array of hashes in which each hash represents one student

examples.description: is a class method that scrapes a student's profile page and returns a hash of attributes describing an individual student
examples.full_description: Scraper #scrape_profile_page is a class method that scrapes a student's profile page and returns a hash of attributes describing an individual student

examples.description: can handle profile pages without all of the social links
examples.full_description: Scraper #scrape_profile_page can handle profile pages without all of the social links

examples.description: takes in an argument of a hash and sets that new student's attributes using the key/value pairs of that hash.
examples.full_description: Student #new takes in an argument of a hash and sets that new student's attributes using the key/value pairs of that hash.

examples.description: adds that new student to the Student class' collection of all existing students, stored in the `@@all` class variable.
examples.full_description: Student #new adds that new student to the Student class' collection of all existing students, stored in the `@@all` class variable.

examples.description: uses the Scraper class to create new students with the correct name and location.
examples.full_description: Student .create_from_collection uses the Scraper class to create new students with the correct name and location.

examples.description: uses the Scraper class to get a hash of a given students attributes and uses that hash to set additional attributes for that student.
examples.full_description: Student #add_student_attributes uses the Scraper class to get a hash of a given students attributes and uses that hash to set additional attributes for that student.
